title: Reverting PR #10297
body:
Fixes #10378

### Context
The original modification from https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10297 resulted in an incorrect exit code being returned in certain situations.

### Changes Made
Reverting back to original state.

### Testing


### Notes

commit.message: Reverting PR #10297. The change caused to return wrong exit code in some cases.

nodes.body: For the record, the issue wasn't the wrong exit code but `ConsoleOutput` of the Exec task being empty.
